Confirmed it is not a recent regression - v3037 has the same issue on Kevin's 
notebook. v3036 and previous version did not support Mozilla 1.4.

Previous similar problem ('solved' by reinstalling RH EL3):
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=54977

Current workaround is to set the LD_LIBRARY_PATH explicitely or to log as root.

To be tested: build our mozilla binding library on Kevin's notebook.
